title: EWC - Legal PID
description: Schema for Legal PID -  EWC WP3

issuer_name.description: Name of issuer from the MS that issued the ODI instance

issuer_id.description: ODI Id of the issuing authority. (Business register identifier for BRIS)

issuer_country.description: Alpha-2 country code, as defined in ISO 3166-1, of the issuing country or territory.

issuance_date.description: Date and possibly time of issuance

expiry_date.description: Date and possibly time of ODI expiration

authentic_source_id.description: ODI Id of the issuing authority. (Business register identifier for BRIS)

authentic_source_name.description: Name of issuer from the MS that issued the ODI instance

legal_person_id.description: Unique id for organisation according to EUID

credentialStatus.description: Defines suspension and/or revocation details for the issued credential. Further redefined by the type extension

id.description: Exact identity for the credential status

credentialSchema.description: One or more schemas that validate the Verifiable Credential.
Contains information about the credential schema on which the issued credential is based

id.description: References the credential schema stored on the Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) on which the Verifiable Authorisation is based on
